verses.roman:
nityānanda-dayā more tāṅre dekhāila
śrī-rādhā-madana-mohane prabhu kari' dila

synonyms: nityānanda-dayā—the mercy of Lord Nityānanda; more—unto me; tāṅre—Madanamohana; dekhāila—showed; śrī-rādhā-madana-mohane—Rādhā-Madanamohana; prabhu kari' dila—gave as my Lord and master.
translation: The mercy of Lord Nityānanda showed me Śrī Madanamohana and gave me Śrī Madanamohana as my Lord and master.
